function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Complete shutdown of public sports facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Revised and amended regulation targeting indoor and outdoor sports facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of partial and full lockdowns on physical and mental health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health crisis requiring better exchange of information on the mitigation of risks and national reporting of infection situation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promoting the value of physical activities to overcome the consequences on citizens’ well-being in times of COVID-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Informal and formal interactions among occupants in health club facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of staff training and supervision for precautionary measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of shared spaces and lack of confidence among members","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spacing the equipment at condensed arrangements may not effectively limit physical proximity, leading to increased risk of contagion.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and lack of UV light sterilization may result in the persistence of disease-causing agents in the indoor environment.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of digital monitoring and management systems may hinder the effective implementation of preventive measures and tracking of facility performance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High human traffic and social interactions increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited ventilation in waiting areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shared amenities in the break lounge","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overcrowding due to reservation system limitations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity of lockers, toilets, and change booths may increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals in the swimming pool and jacuzzi areas may lead to the spread of contagions.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the indoor running track area may lead to stagnant air and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to limited window openings, increasing the risk of airborne disease spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of injuries from accidental falls due to uneven walls and varying voids along the track","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for surface contamination on the track flooring leading to the spread of infections","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Condensed arrangement of equipment may increase the risk of close contact and the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposed and painted black air ducts may contribute to the spread of airborne contaminants and pathogens within the hall.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals and shared equipment increases the risk of fomite transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to fixed windows and limited airflow control","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective occupancy management and monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of surface transmission due to shared equipment and facilities","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete temperature testing may allow asymptomatic carriers to enter the facility, increasing the risk of disease spread.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of mask-wearing may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within the facility.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited availability of full body sterilizers and reliance only on hand sanitizers can result in inadequate disinfection of individuals entering the facility.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continuous cleaning and sterilization practices may not be effective in preventing the spread of contagious diseases if not done properly or if the cleaning products used are not effective against the specific pathogen.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Removal of shared and reusable resources may reduce the risk of surface contamination, but if not replaced with adequate alternatives, it may lead to dissatisfaction among building occupants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited occupancy measures may not be effectively enforced without proper control measures or technologies, leading to overcrowding and increased risk of physical interactions and disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close proximity of towels hangers and lockers increases the risk of contagious disease transmission among members.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clear markings and separation of warm-up areas and running lanes increases the potential for members to interact closely, leading to an increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient cleaning and sterilization of equipment and machines increases the risk of disease transmission among gym members.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Members not pre-booking on the digital calendar","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Masks being taken off during group sessions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited number of interactions between members allowed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased occupancy during nighttime operation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of spatial arrangement for equipment and crowded queuing","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for virtual training classes and reduced interaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate protective equipment and cleaning tools for janitors","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in cleaning and operation processes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate post-pandemic measures for facility prevention and preparedness","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Replacement of air duct types from aluminum to fabric could lead to the spread of contaminants if not managed properly.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of filters in diffusers increases the risk of spreading contaminants through the supplied air.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection measures can lead to the spread of contagious diseases within the facility.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Infrequent cleaning of air diffusers and lack of complete sterilization sessions increase the risk of indoor contamination.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate spatial configuration increases the risk of disease transmission during intensive exercise sessions.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
